name: Alaskan Firedragon Spelunky Retro
description:
The goal is simple: You’re the spelunker Get the gold. Kill the enemies. Try not to die.

If you love retro pixel games, then this gameboy inspired fun action packed adventure game is for you.

Play as Alaskan Firedragon Spelunker, the bumbling spelunker out to get gold. Watch out for random enemies you have to kill such as asps and mummies and weird little bats. Platforms are not always what they seem, so watch your step as you make your way through the maze.

What our test users had to say:
“Uhm okay, the graphics are awesome, as in I love them hard. I found myself playing this game for a couple of hours only because I couldn’t put it down and had the insane urge to just jump and kill. It’s fun and just challenging enough to keep me wanting to retry over and over again.” Mr. Alex. P

“It reminds me of the good old days of arcade games and 8 bit graphics.” - Giggle Girl
